verses.kjv: Then Eliashib the high priest rose up with his brethren the priests, and they builded the sheep gate; they sanctified it, and set up the doors of it; even unto the tower of Meah they sanctified it, unto the tower of Hananeel.
verses.web: Then Eliashib the high priest rose up with his brothers the priests, and they built the sheep gate. They sanctified it, and set up its doors. They sanctified it even to the tower of Hammeah, to the tower of Hananel.
verses.ct: Eliashib the high priest and his fellow priests got to work and rebuilt the Sheep Gate. They dedicated it and installed its doors, then dedicated the wall all the way to the Tower of Meah and on to the Tower of Hananeel.

verses.kjv: And next unto him builded the men of Jericho. And next to them builded Zaccur the son of Imri.
verses.web: Next to him the men of Jericho built. Next to them Zaccur the son of Imri built.
verses.ct: The men of Jericho built the section next to them, and Zaccur son of Imri built the section after that.

verses.kjv: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
verses.web: The sons of Hassenaah built the fish gate. They laid its beams, and set up its doors, its bolts, and its bars.
verses.ct: The sons of Hassenaah built the Fish Gate. They set its beams in place and installed its doors, bolts, and bars.

verses.kjv: And next unto them repaired Meremoth the son of Urijah, the son of Koz. And next unto them repaired Meshullam the son of Berechiah, the son of Meshezabeel. And next unto them repaired Zadok the son of Baana.
verses.web: Next to them, Meremoth the son of Uriah, the son of Hakkoz made repairs. Next to them, Meshullam the son of Berechiah, the son of Meshezabel made repairs. Next to them, Zadok the son of Baana made repairs.
verses.ct: Next to them, Meremoth son of Urijah and grandson of Koz made repairs. Next to him, Meshullam son of Berechiah and grandson of Meshezabeel made repairs. Next to him, Zadok son of Baana made repairs.

verses.kjv: And next unto them the Tekoites repaired; but their nobles put not their necks to the work of their LORD.
verses.web: Next to them, the Tekoites made repairs; but their nobles didn’t put their necks to the Lord’s work.
verses.ct: Next to them, the people of Tekoa made repairs — though their nobles refused to do any of the LORD's work.

verses.kjv: Moreover the old gate repaired Jehoiada the son of Paseah, and Meshullam the son of Besodeiah; they laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, and the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
verses.web: Joiada the son of Paseah and Meshullam the son of Besodeiah repaired the old gate. They laid its beams, and set up its doors, and its bolts, and its bars.
verses.ct: Jehoiada son of Paseah and Meshullam son of Besodeiah repaired the Old Gate. They set its beams in place and installed its doors, bolts, and bars.

verses.kjv: And next unto them repaired Melatiah the Gibeonite, and Jadon the Meronothite, the men of Gibeon, and of Mizpah, unto the throne of the governor on this side the river.
verses.web: Next to them, Melatiah the Gibeonite, and Jadon the Meronothite, the men of Gibeon and of Mizpah, repaired the residence of the governor beyond the River.
verses.ct: Next to them, Melatiah the Gibeonite and Jadon the Meronothite made repairs, along with the men of Gibeon and Mizpah, up to the residence of the governor of the province west of the Euphrates.

verses.kjv: Next unto him repaired Uzziel the son of Harhaiah, of the goldsmiths. Next unto him also repaired Hananiah the son of one of the apothecaries, and they fortified Jerusalem unto the broad wall.
verses.web: Next to him, Uzziel the son of Harhaiah, goldsmiths, made repairs. Next to him, Hananiah, one of the perfumers, made repairs, and they fortified Jerusalem even to the wide wall.
verses.ct: Next to them, Uzziel son of Harhaiah, one of the goldsmiths, made repairs. Next to him, Hananiah, one of the perfume makers, made repairs. Together they fortified Jerusalem as far as the Broad Wall.

verses.kjv: And next unto them repaired Rephaiah the son of Hur, the ruler of the half part of Jerusalem.
verses.web: Next to them, Rephaiah the son of Hur, the ruler of half the district of Jerusalem, made repairs.
verses.ct: Next to them, Rephaiah son of Hur, who governed half the district of Jerusalem, made repairs.

verses.kjv: And next unto them repaired Jedaiah the son of Harumaph, even over against his house. And next unto him repaired Hattush the son of Hashabniah.
verses.web: Next to them, Jedaiah the son of Harumaph made repairs across from his house. Next to him, Hattush the son of Hashabneiah made repairs.
verses.ct: Next to him, Jedaiah son of Harumaph made repairs across from his own house. Next to him, Hattush son of Hashabniah made repairs.

verses.kjv: Malchijah the son of Harim, and Hashub the son of Pahathmoab, repaired the other piece, and the tower of the furnaces.
verses.web: Malchijah the son of Harim, and Hasshub the son of Pahathmoab, repaired another portion, and the tower of the furnaces.
verses.ct: Malchijah son of Harim and Hashub son of Pahathmoab repaired another section, including the Tower of the Furnaces.

verses.kjv: And next unto him repaired Shallum the son of Halohesh, the ruler of the half part of Jerusalem, he and his daughters.
verses.web: Next to him, Shallum the son of Hallohesh, the ruler of half the district of Jerusalem, he and his daughters, made repairs.
verses.ct: Next to them, Shallum son of Halohesh, who governed the other half of the district of Jerusalem, made repairs — he and his daughters.

verses.kjv: The valley gate repaired Hanun, and the inhabitants of Zanoah; they built it, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof, and a thousand cubits on the wall unto the dung gate.
verses.web: Hanun and the inhabitants of Zanoah repaired the valley gate. They built it, and set up its doors, its bolts, and its bars, and one thousand cubits of the wall to the dung gate.
verses.ct: Hanun and the people of Zanoah repaired the Valley Gate. They rebuilt it and installed its doors, bolts, and bars. They also repaired 1,000 cubits of the wall, all the way to the Dung Gate.

verses.kjv: But the dung gate repaired Malchiah the son of Rechab, the ruler of part of Bethhaccerem; he built it, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
verses.web: Malchijah the son of Rechab, the ruler of the district of Beth Haccherem repaired the dung gate. He built it, and set up its doors, its bolts, and its bars.
verses.ct: Malchiah son of Rechab, who governed the district of Bethhaccerem, repaired the Dung Gate. He rebuilt it and installed its doors, bolts, and bars.

verses.kjv: But the gate of the fountain repaired Shallun the son of Colhozeh, the ruler of part of Mizpah; he built it, and covered it, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof, and the wall of the pool of Siloah by the king’s garden, and unto the stairs that go down from the city of David.
verses.web: Shallun the son of Colhozeh, the ruler of the district of Mizpah repaired the spring gate. He built it, and covered it, and set up its doors, its bolts, and its bars, and the wall of the pool of Shelah by the king’s garden, even to the stairs that go down from David’s city.
verses.ct: Shallun son of Colhozeh, who governed the district of Mizpah, repaired the Fountain Gate. He rebuilt it, put a roof over it, and installed its doors, bolts, and bars. He also repaired the wall by the Pool of Siloah near the king's garden, all the way to the stairs leading down from the city of David.

verses.kjv: After him repaired Nehemiah the son of Azbuk, the ruler of the half part of Bethzur, unto the place over against the sepulchres of David, and to the pool that was made, and unto the house of the mighty.
verses.web: After him, Nehemiah the son of Azbuk, the ruler of half the district of Beth Zur, made repairs to the place opposite the tombs of David, and to the pool that was made, and to the house of the mighty men.
verses.ct: After him, Nehemiah son of Azbuk, who governed half the district of Bethzur, made repairs as far as the area across from David's tombs, then on to the man-made pool and the house of the mighty men.

verses.kjv: After him repaired the Levites, Rehum the son of Bani. Next unto him repaired Hashabiah, the ruler of the half part of Keilah, in his part.
verses.web: After him, the Levites, Rehum the son of Bani made repairs. Next to him, Hashabiah, the ruler of half the district of Keilah, made repairs for his district.
verses.ct: After him, the Levites made repairs under Rehum son of Bani. Next to him, Hashabiah, who governed half the district of Keilah, made repairs for his district.

verses.kjv: After him repaired their brethren, Bavai the son of Henadad, the ruler of the half part of Keilah.
verses.web: After him, their brothers, Bavvai the son of Henadad, the ruler of half the district of Keilah made repairs.
verses.ct: After him, their fellow Levites made repairs under Bavai son of Henadad, who governed the other half of the district of Keilah.

verses.kjv: And next to him repaired Ezer the son of Jeshua, the ruler of Mizpah, another piece over against the going up to the armoury at the turning of the wall.
verses.web: Next to him, Ezer the son of Jeshua, the ruler of Mizpah, repaired another portion, across from the ascent to the armory at the turning of the wall.
verses.ct: Next to him, Ezer son of Jeshua, the ruler of Mizpah, repaired another section across from the ascent to the armory at the angle of the wall.

verses.kjv: After him Baruch the son of Zabbai earnestly repaired the other piece, from the turning of the wall unto the door of the house of Eliashib the high priest.
verses.web: After him, Baruch the son of Zabbai earnestly repaired another portion, from the turning of the wall to the door of the house of Eliashib the high priest.
verses.ct: After him, Baruch son of Zabbai threw himself into repairing another section, from the angle of the wall to the door of the house of Eliashib the high priest.

verses.kjv: After him repaired Meremoth the son of Urijah the son of Koz another piece, from the door of the house of Eliashib even to the end of the house of Eliashib.
verses.web: After him, Meremoth the son of Uriah the son of Hakkoz repaired another portion, from the door of the house of Eliashib even to the end of the house of Eliashib.
verses.ct: After him, Meremoth son of Urijah and grandson of Koz repaired another section, from the door of Eliashib's house to the far end of it.

verses.kjv: And after him repaired the priests, the men of the plain.
verses.web: After him, the priests, the men of the Plain made repairs.
verses.ct: After him, the priests who lived in the surrounding plain made repairs.

verses.kjv: After him repaired Benjamin and Hashub over against their house. After him repaired Azariah the son of Maaseiah the son of Ananiah by his house.
verses.web: After them, Benjamin and Hasshub made repairs across from their house. After them, Azariah the son of Maaseiah the son of Ananiah made repairs beside his own house.
verses.ct: After them, Benjamin and Hashub made repairs across from their own house. After them, Azariah son of Maaseiah and grandson of Ananiah made repairs next to his own house.

verses.kjv: After him repaired Binnui the son of Henadad another piece, from the house of Azariah unto the turning of the wall, even unto the corner.
verses.web: After him, Binnui the son of Henadad repaired another portion, from the house of Azariah to the turning of the wall, and to the corner.
verses.ct: After him, Binnui son of Henadad repaired another section, from the house of Azariah to the angle of the wall and on to the corner.

verses.kjv: Palal the son of Uzai, over against the turning of the wall, and the tower which lieth out from the king’s high house, that was by the court of the prison. After him Pedaiah the son of Parosh.
verses.web: Palal the son of Uzai made repairs opposite the turning of the wall, and the tower that stands out from the upper house of the king, which is by the court of the guard. After him Pedaiah the son of Parosh made repairs.
verses.ct: Palal son of Uzai made repairs across from the angle of the wall and the tower that extends out from the upper palace near the court of the guard. After him, Pedaiah son of Parosh made repairs.

verses.kjv: Moreover the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel, unto the place over against the water gate toward the east, and the tower that lieth out.
verses.web: (Now the temple servants lived in Ophel, to the place opposite the water gate toward the east, and the tower that stands out.)
verses.ct: The temple servants lived on the hill of Ophel and worked as far as the area across from the Water Gate on the east side and the tower that extends outward.

verses.kjv: After them the Tekoites repaired another piece, over against the great tower that lieth out, even unto the wall of Ophel.
verses.web: After him the Tekoites repaired another portion, opposite the great tower that stands out, and to the wall of Ophel.
verses.ct: After them, the people of Tekoa repaired another section, from across the great projecting tower all the way to the wall of Ophel.

verses.kjv: From above the horse gate repaired the priests, every one over against his house.
verses.web: Above the horse gate, the priests made repairs, everyone across from his own house.
verses.ct: Above the Horse Gate, the priests each made repairs across from their own houses.

verses.kjv: After them repaired Zadok the son of Immer over against his house. After him repaired also Shemaiah the son of Shechaniah, the keeper of the east gate.
verses.web: After them, Zadok the son of Immer made repairs across from his own house. After him, Shemaiah the son of Shecaniah, the keeper of the east gate made repairs.
verses.ct: After them, Zadok son of Immer made repairs across from his own house. After him, Shemaiah son of Shechaniah, the keeper of the East Gate, made repairs.

verses.kjv: After him repaired Hananiah the son of Shelemiah, and Hanun the sixth son of Zalaph, another piece. After him repaired Meshullam the son of Berechiah over against his chamber.
verses.web: After him, Hananiah the son of Shelemiah, and Hanun the sixth son of Zalaph, repaired another portion. After him, Meshullam the son of Berechiah made repairs across from his room.
verses.ct: After him, Hananiah son of Shelemiah and Hanun, the 6th son of Zalaph, repaired another section. After them, Meshullam son of Berechiah made repairs across from his own room.

verses.kjv: After him repaired Malchiah the goldsmith’s son unto the place of the Nethinims, and of the merchants, over against the gate Miphkad, and to the going up of the corner.
verses.web: After him, Malchijah, one of the goldsmiths to the house of the temple servants, and of the merchants, made repairs opposite the gate of Hammiphkad, and to the ascent of the corner.
verses.ct: After him, Malchiah, one of the goldsmiths, made repairs as far as the quarters of the temple servants and the merchants, across from the Miphkad Gate and up to the room above the corner.

verses.kjv: And between the going up of the corner unto the sheep gate repaired the goldsmiths and the merchants.
verses.web: Between the ascent of the corner and the sheep gate, the goldsmiths and the merchants made repairs.
verses.ct: The goldsmiths and merchants made repairs on the final section between the room above the corner and the Sheep Gate.
